pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister of New Zealand Jacinda Ardern | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, the Prime Minister spoke by phone with the Prime Minister of New Zealand, Jacinda Ardern. The two leaders exchanged views on trade issues of mutual concern and on ways to advance a progressive trade agenda.

Both prime ministers also looked forward to the possibility that they might meet again at the Commonwealth Heads of Government meeting in London in April.
